item.title: Anxiety Report: Week I
item.description: Workplace anxiety My workplace is where I experience the most of my anxiety, this sort of panic attacks happened in the following situations: My anxiety symptoms are the following I feel like I can’t breathe I’m unable to swallow I experience a lot of fear to die by choking On the way through the Hall When I arrive early in the morning, most of the times I’m unable to move.

item.title: First Post
item.description: Hello World This is my first post from my new blog. It look pretty good even if it’s only an early stage. Why I built it I found it a very useful tool for talking about myself, my passions and my worries. I have a strong anxiety issue, so I think this blog can help me to feel better and beat this “Monster”. I would like to clarify that I haven’t been diagnosed with any kind of panic disorder, I’m only trying to find a way to beat or limit my anxiety.
